verses.verse: These are the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; Reuben<WH7205>, Simeon<WH8095>, Levi<WH3878>, and Judah<WH3063>, Issachar<WH3485>, and Zebulun<WH2074>, Israel: or, Jacob
Dan<WH1835>, Joseph<WH3130>, and Benjamin<WH1144>, Naphtali<WH5321>, Gad<WH1410>, and Asher<WH836>.

The sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>; Er<WH6147>, and Onan<WH209>, and Shelah<WH7956>: which three<WH7969> were born<WH3205> unto him of the daughter<WH1323> of Shua<WH7774> <WH1340> the Canaanitess<WH3669>. And Er<WH6147>, the firstborn<WH1060> of Judah<WH3063>, was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068>; and he slew<WH4191> him.
And Tamar<WH8559> his daughter in law<WH3618> bare<WH3205> him Pharez<WH6557> and Zerah<WH2226>. All the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> were five<WH2568>.
The sons<WH1121> of Pharez<WH6557>; Hezron<WH2696>, and Hamul<WH2538>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226>; Zimri<WH2174>, and Ethan<WH387>, and Heman<WH1968>, and Calcol<WH3633>, and Dara<WH1873>: five<WH2568> of them in all. Zimri: or, Zabdi Dara: or, Darda
And the sons<WH1121> of Carmi<WH3756>; Achar<WH5917>, the troubler<WH5916> of Israel<WH3478>, who transgressed<WH4603> in the thing accursed<WH2764>. Achar: or, Achan
And the sons<WH1121> of Ethan<WH387>; Azariah<WH5838>.
The sons<WH1121> also of Hezron<WH2696>, that were born<WH3205> unto him; Jerahmeel<WH3396>, and Ram<WH7410>, and Chelubai<WH3621>. Ram: Gr. Aram Chelubai: or, Caleb
And Ram<WH7410> begat<WH3205> Amminadab<WH5992>; and Amminadab<WH5992> begat<WH3205> Nahshon<WH5177>, prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>;
And Nahshon<WH5177> begat<WH3205> Salma<WH8007>, and Salma<WH8007> begat<WH3205> Boaz<WH1162>,
And Boaz<WH1162> begat<WH3205> Obed<WH5744>, and Obed<WH5744> begat<WH3205> Jesse<WH3448>,
And Jesse<WH3448> begat<WH3205> his firstborn<WH1060> Eliab<WH446>, and Abinadab<WH41> the second<WH8145>, and Shimma<WH8092> the third<WH7992>, Shimma: or, Shammah
Nethaneel<WH5417> the fourth<WH7243>, Raddai<WH7288> the fifth<WH2549>,
Ozem<WH684> the sixth<WH8345>, David<WH1732> the seventh<WH7637>:
Whose sisters<WH269> were Zeruiah<WH6870>, and Abigail<WH26>. And the sons<WH1121> of Zeruiah<WH6870>; Abishai<WH52>, and Joab<WH3097>, and Asahel<WH6214>, three<WH7969>.
And Abigail<WH26> bare<WH3205> Amasa<WH6021>: and the father<WH1> of Amasa<WH6021> was Jether<WH3500> the Ishmeelite<WH3459>.

And Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Hezron<WH2696> begat<WH3205> children of<WH854> Azubah<WH5806> his wife<WH802>, and of Jerioth<WH3408>: her sons<WH1121> are these; Jesher<WH3475>, and Shobab<WH7727>, and Ardon<WH715>.
And when Azubah<WH5806> was dead<WH4191>, Caleb<WH3612> took<WH3947> unto him Ephrath<WH672>, which bare<WH3205> him Hur<WH2354>.
And Hur<WH2354> begat<WH3205> Uri<WH221>, and Uri<WH221> begat<WH3205> Bezaleel<WH1212>.

And afterward<WH310> Hezron<WH2696> went in<WH935> to the daughter<WH1323> of Machir<WH4353> the father<WH1> of Gilead<WH1568>, whom he married<WH3947> when he was threescore<WH8346> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>; and she bare<WH3205> him Segub<WH7687>. married: Heb. took
And Segub<WH7687> begat<WH3205> Jair<WH2971>, who had three<WH7969> and twenty<WH6242> cities<WH5892> in the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568>.

And he took<WH3947> Geshur<WH1650>, and Aram<WH758>, with the towns<WH2333> of Jair<WH2971>, from them, with Kenath<WH7079>, and the towns<WH1323> thereof, even threescore<WH8346> cities<WH5892>. All these belonged to the sons<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the father<WH1> of Gilead<WH1568>.
And after<WH310> that Hezron<WH2696> was dead<WH4194> in Calebephratah<WH3613>, then Abiah<WH29> Hezron's<WH2696> wife<WH802> bare<WH3205> him Ashur<WH806> the father<WH1> of Tekoa<WH8620>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> the firstborn<WH1060> of Hezron<WH2696> were, Ram<WH7410> the firstborn<WH1060>, and Bunah<WH946>, and Oren<WH767>, and Ozem<WH684>, and Ahijah<WH281>.
Jerahmeel<WH3396> had also another<WH312> wife<WH802>, whose name<WH8034> was Atarah<WH5851>; she was the mother<WH517> of Onam<WH208>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Ram<WH7410> the firstborn<WH1060> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> were, Maaz<WH4619>, and Jamin<WH3226>, and Eker<WH6134>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Onam<WH208> were, Shammai<WH8060>, and Jada<WH3047>. And the sons<WH1121> of Shammai<WH8060>; Nadab<WH5070>, and Abishur<WH51>.
And the name<WH8034> of the wife<WH802> of Abishur<WH51> was Abihail<WH32>, and she bare<WH3205> him Ahban<WH257>, and Molid<WH4140>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Nadab<WH5070>; Seled<WH5540>, and Appaim<WH649>: but Seled<WH5540> died<WH4191> without children<WH1121>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Appaim<WH649>; Ishi<WH3469>. And the sons<WH1121> of Ishi<WH3469>; Sheshan<WH8348>. And the children<WH1121> of Sheshan<WH8348>; Ahlai<WH304>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Jada<WH3047> the brother<WH251> of Shammai<WH8060>; Jether<WH3500>, and Jonathan<WH3129>: and Jether<WH3500> died<WH4191> without children<WH1121>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3129>; Peleth<WH6431>, and Zaza<WH2117>. These were the sons<WH1121> of Jerahmeel<WH3396>.
Now Sheshan<WH8348> had no sons<WH1121>, but daughters<WH1323>. And Sheshan<WH8348> had a servant<WH5650>, an Egyptian<WH4713>, whose name<WH8034> was Jarha<WH3398>.
And Sheshan<WH8348> gave<WH5414> his daughter<WH1323> to Jarha<WH3398> his servant<WH5650> to wife<WH802>; and she bare<WH3205> him Attai<WH6262>.
And Attai<WH6262> begat<WH3205> Nathan<WH5416>, and Nathan<WH5416> begat<WH3205> Zabad<WH2066>,
And Zabad<WH2066> begat<WH3205> Ephlal<WH654>, and Ephlal<WH654> begat<WH3205> Obed<WH5744>,
And Obed<WH5744> begat<WH3205> Jehu<WH3058>, and Jehu<WH3058> begat<WH3205> Azariah<WH5838>,
And Azariah<WH5838> begat<WH3205> Helez<WH2503>, and Helez<WH2503> begat<WH3205> Eleasah<WH501>,
And Eleasah<WH501> begat<WH3205> Sisamai<WH5581>, and Sisamai<WH5581> begat<WH3205> Shallum<WH7967>,
And Shallum<WH7967> begat<WH3205> Jekamiah<WH3359>, and Jekamiah<WH3359> begat<WH3205> Elishama<WH476>.

Now the sons<WH1121> of Caleb<WH3612> the brother<WH251> of Jerahmeel<WH3396> were, Mesha<WH4337> his firstborn<WH1060>, which was the father<WH1> of Ziph<WH2128>; and the sons<WH1121> of Mareshah<WH4762> the father<WH1> of Hebron<WH2275>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Hebron<WH2275>; Korah<WH7141>, and Tappuah<WH8599>, and Rekem<WH7552>, and Shema<WH8087>.
And Shema<WH8087> begat<WH3205> Raham<WH7357>, the father<WH1> of Jorkoam<WH3421>: and Rekem<WH7552> begat<WH3205> Shammai<WH8060>.
And the son<WH1121> of Shammai<WH8060> was Maon<WH4584>: and Maon<WH4584> was the father<WH1> of Bethzur<WH1049>.
And Ephah<WH5891>, Caleb's<WH3612> concubine<WH6370>, bare<WH3205> Haran<WH2771>, and Moza<WH4162>, and Gazez<WH1495>: and Haran<WH2771> begat<WH3205> Gazez<WH1495>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Jahdai<WH3056>; Regem<WH7276>, and Jotham<WH3147>, and Geshan<WH1529>, and Pelet<WH6404>, and Ephah<WH5891>, and Shaaph<WH8174>.
Maachah<WH4601>, Caleb's<WH3612> concubine<WH6370>, bare<WH3205> Sheber<WH7669>, and Tirhanah<WH8647>.

She bare<WH3205> also Shaaph<WH8174> the father<WH1> of Madmannah<WH4089>, Sheva<WH7724> the father<WH1> of Machbenah<WH4343>, and the father<WH1> of Gibea<WH1388>: and the daughter<WH1323> of Caleb<WH3612> was Achsah<WH5915>.
These were the sons<WH1121> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Hur<WH2354>, the firstborn<WH1060> of Ephratah<WH672>; Shobal<WH7732> the father<WH1> of Kirjathjearim<WH7157>,
Salma<WH8007> the father<WH1> of Bethlehem<WH1035>, Hareph<WH2780> the father<WH1> of Bethgader<WH1013>.

And Shobal<WH7732> the father<WH1> of Kirjathjearim<WH7157> had sons<WH1121>; Haroeh<WH7204>, and half<WH2677> of the Manahethites<WH2679>. Haroeh: or, Reaiah half: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsihammenuchoth

And the families<WH4940> of Kirjathjearim<WH7157>; the Ithrites<WH3505>, and the Puhites<WH6336>, and the Shumathites<WH8126>, and the Mishraites<WH4954>; of them came<WH3318> the Zareathites<WH6882>, and the Eshtaulites<WH848>.

The sons<WH1121> of Salma<WH8007>; Bethlehem<WH1035>, and the Netophathites<WH5200>, Ataroth<WH5852>, the house of Joab<WH5854>, and half<WH2677> of the Manahethites<WH2680>, the Zorites<WH6882>. Ataroth: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab

And the families<WH4940> of the scribes<WH5608> which dwelt<WH3427> <WH3427> at Jabez<WH3258>; the Tirathites<WH8654>, the Shimeathites<WH8101>, and Suchathites<WH7756>. These<WH1992> are the Kenites<WH7017> that came<WH935> of Hemath<WH2574>, the father<WH1> of the house<WH1004> of Rechab<WH7394>.
